author: FOX Sports
title: Social Roundup: See what athletes are doing with their seasons suspended – April 6
description: With play suspended across all professional sports leagues, athletes are spending more time on social media than ever before.
content: With the NBA, MLB, NHL and other major sports leagues and sporting events suspended or canceled because of the coronavirus, professional athletes are spending their free time working out, playing video games, learning how to play instruments and more. Have a … [+4298 chars]
